data.Math:: was chosen because, well, it is Maths. Vector geometry.
data.description: Project vectorial function from 3D to plane
data.similar: None I know of, none rhizomatic #perl could point me at.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
You might have seen a similar namespace registration request
    recently for Math::Project_3D. The underscore is bad. Hence this
    request. Math::Project_3D has been deleted from CPAN.

    Given a function of three components and of an arbitrary number of
    parameters, the module allows you to project any point of the
    function (specified by its function parameters) onto an arbitrary
    plane in R^3 along any vector.

    Math:: was chosen because, well, it is Maths. Vector geometry.
    Project3D was chosen because ology suggested it on #perl and I could
    not think of a more appropriate name. I'm open for suggestions at
    mail at steffen-mueller dot net.
